text: Bill Hager (February 6, 1947 â€“ October 13, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Florida House of Representatives as a Republican from 2010 until 2018. Hager died of lung disease on October 13, 2021, in Fargo, North Dakota at age 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:lawyers from Minnesota Category:lawyers from Florida Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
